definition: to assign/to entrust (a task)/to give/to bestow
to place (hope, importance etc) on/to express/to show/to give
to ask sb to carefully consider a request (idiom)
to give as one sees fit
to ignore/to brush off/to dismiss/to pay no attention to

sentences.english: Patients in the Saimeian powder group took the Saimeian powder with rivanol gauze for external application everyday after operations.
sentences.chinese: 賽黴安散組術後每天予外用賽黴安散和雷佛奴爾紗條。

sentences.english: Two copies of each entry should be submitted.
sentences.chinese: 每件參賽作品需提交兩套作品予主辦機構。

sentences.english: A clerk has just delivered the token by a bicycle.
sentences.chinese: 站員以腳踏車遞送路牌予司機員以爭取時間。

sentences.english: For oversea exhibitors, we will send the Admission Ticket by airmail.
sentences.chinese: 主辦單位將會以空郵寄出入場券予海外參展商。

sentences.english: Party A will issue a written receipt after receiving the payment.
sentences.chinese: 甲方收到租金後予書面簽收。

sentences.english: Confirmation letter will be sent to pre-registered participants.
sentences.chinese: 大會將發出確認函予優先報名參加者。

sentences.english: I know what makes me strang and confident.
sentences.chinese: 我懂得是什麼予我力量和自信。

sentences.english: Aryans responded by stopping food supply and manufactured goods.
sentences.chinese: 雅利停糧食品供應予迴應。

sentences.english: Did you buy any jewelry for yourself or others in the last six months?
sentences.chinese: 在過去的六個月內，您曾否購買首飾予自己或他人？

sentences.english: If in doubt please check with Human Resources.
sentences.chinese: 如果有疑問請予人力資源部覈對。

sentences.english: Rheumatologists and nurses both gave high marks to the supplied materials.
sentences.chinese: 風溼病學家和護士都給予這個材料予很高的評分。

sentences.english: Check up with built-in pipe& hole& so on as per drawings during civil construction.
sentences.chinese: 依據圖紙設計檢查土建的予埋件預留空洞。

sentences.english: Over 90 percent of the labels are issued to newly imported, quiet models.
sentences.chinese: 九成以上的標籤都是簽發予新近進口的低噪音設備。

sentences.english: I agree that the above data will be released to the manager of the church and the church.
sentences.chinese: 本人同意上述個人資料會轉交予經理及教堂。

sentences.english: In the great Shun I see the case of one whose desire at fifty year's was towards them.'
sentences.chinese: 五十而慕者，予於大舜見之矣。

sentences.english: Whosoever shall smite thee on thy right cheek, turn to him the other also.
sentences.chinese: 若有人打汝之右頰，則更以左頰予之。

definition: (to do sth) separately/as a separate action
to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited
to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control
not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
to use discretion/to take circumstances into account/to make allowances pertinent to a situation
its place/one's appointed place/the place for that
